title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4 could pack a bigger battery
content:
Although nearly nine months old at this point, the Galaxy Z Flip 3 remains the best compact foldable phone on the market. The Galaxy Z Flip 3 represented a big step up over its predecessor, offering a four times bigger external display, enhanced durability, IPX8 water resistance, and a more palatable price tag. But as

The post Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4 could pack a bigger battery appeared first on XDA.
description: According to a report from GalaxyClub, the Galaxy Z Flip 4 will reportedly come with a bigger battery. Read on to know more.
